item.title: Why I Love Corona
item.description: Sample Corona Projects Before I begin, I thought I should start out by showing you some screenshots of the application that I have created! Namely: Sleep Tight and The Daily Dose. What Do I Use Corona For? Currently, I primarily use Corona SDK for Business Mobile Application in which I publish onto the Google Play Store. Is Corona Worth Learning? Currently Corona SDK is primarily used with Lua Programming Language which is easy to learn.
